typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOCIEDAD_CO as string,
		COD_SOCIEDAD as string,
		DESC_SOCIEDAD as string,
		NRO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		POSICION as string,
		COD_CEBE as string,
		DESC_CEBE as string,
		PERIODO as string,
		FECHA_DOCUMENTO as string,
		COD_CLIENTE as string,
		NOMBRE_CLIENTE as string,
		COD_TIPOTIENDA as string,
		DESC_TIPOTIENDA as string,
		COD_TIENDA as string,
		DESC_TIENDA as string,
		COD_MARCA as string,
		DESC_MARCA as string,
		COD_ORG_VTA as string,
		DESC_ORG_VTA as string,
		COD_CANAL as string,
		DESC_CANAL as string,
		COD_CALIDAD as string,
		DESC_CALIDAD as string,
		COD_GENERO as string,
		DESC_GENERO as string,
		COD_LINEA as string,
		DESC_LINEA as string,
		COD_TIPO as string,
		DESC_TIPO as string,
		COD_PRENDA as string,
		DESC_PRENDA as string,
		COD_TIPOARTICULO as string,
		DESC_TIPOARTICULO as string,
		COD_ARTICULO as string,
		DESC_ARTICULO as string,
		COD_GENERICO as string,
		DESC_GENERICO as string,
		COD_MODELO as string,
		COD_COLOR as string,
		TALLA as string,
		LARGO as string,
		UNIDADES as string,
		COD_TEMPORADA as string,
		DESC_TEMPORADA as string,
		COD_GRADOMODA as string,
		DESC_GRADOMODA as string,
		INGRESOS as string,
		COSTOS as string,
		DESC_CONSIGNACION as string,
		DESC_PROMOCION as string,
		DESC_CLOSEOUT as string,
		DESC_PRONTOPAGO as string,
		DESC_PERSONAL as string,
		DESC_CLIENTE as string,
		MONEDA as string,
		GTIN as string,
		COD_GRADOMODA_PERU as string,
		DESC_GRADOMODA_PERU as string,
		ANO_ESTACION as string,
		ID_VENDEDOR as string,
		{CAPSULAS-WAM} as string,
		{DESC. CAPSULAS-WAM} as string,
		{CONSUMER GROUP 2} as string,
		{DESC. CONSUMER GROUP 2} as string,
		{CONSUMER TARGET} as string,
		{DESC. CONSUMER_TARGET} as string,
		{FIT REFERENCE} as string,
		{DESC. FIT REFERENCE} as string,
		{GLOBAL FIT PLATFORM} as string,
		{PRODUCT LINE} as string,
		{DESC. PRODUCT LINE} as string,
		{PRODUCT NAME} as string,
		PROGRAM as string,
		{DESC. PROGRAM} as string,
		SUBCLASS as string,
		SUSTENTABILIDAD as string,
		{DESC. SUSTENTABILIDAD} as string,
		TECNO as string,
		{DESC. TECNO} as string,
		TIER as string,
		{DESC. TIER} as string,
		CLASS as string,
		{DESC. CLASS} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VtaBoliviaDL
select1 derive(SOCIEDAD_CO = substring(SOCIEDAD_CO,1,50),
		COD_SOCIEDAD = substring(COD_SOCIEDAD,1,50),
		DESC_SOCIEDAD = substring(DESC_SOCIEDAD,1,50),
		NRO_DOCUMENTO = substring(NRO_DOCUMENTO,1,50),
		POSICION = substring(POSICION,1,50),
		COD_CEBE = substring(COD_CEBE,1,50),
		DESC_CEBE = substring(DESC_CEBE,1,50),
		PERIODO = substring(PERIODO,1,50),
		FECHA_DOCUMENTO = substring(FECHA_DOCUMENTO,1,50),
		COD_CLIENTE = substring(COD_CLIENTE,1,50),
		NOMBRE_CLIENTE = substring(NOMBRE_CLIENTE,1,50),
		COD_TIPOTIENDA = substring(COD_TIPOTIENDA,1,50),
		DESC_TIPOTIENDA = substring(DESC_TIPOTIENDA,1,50),
		COD_TIENDA = substring(COD_TIENDA,1,50),
		DESC_TIENDA = substring(DESC_TIENDA,1,50),
		COD_MARCA = substring(COD_MARCA,1,50),
		DESC_MARCA = substring(DESC_MARCA,1,50),
		COD_ORG_VTA = substring(COD_ORG_VTA,1,50),
		DESC_ORG_VTA = substring(DESC_ORG_VTA,1,50),
		COD_CANAL = substring(COD_CANAL,1,50),
		DESC_CANAL = substring(DESC_CANAL,1,50),
		COD_CALIDAD = substring(COD_CALIDAD,1,50),
		DESC_CALIDAD = substring(DESC_CALIDAD,1,50),
		COD_GENERO = substring(COD_GENERO,1,50),
		DESC_GENERO = substring(DESC_GENERO,1,50),
		COD_LINEA = substring(COD_LINEA,1,50),
		DESC_LINEA = substring(DESC_LINEA,1,50),
		COD_TIPO = substring(COD_TIPO,1,50),
		DESC_TIPO = substring(DESC_TIPO,1,50),
		COD_PRENDA = substring(COD_PRENDA,1,50),
		DESC_PRENDA = substring(DESC_PRENDA,1,50),
		COD_TIPOARTICULO = substring(COD_TIPOARTICULO,1,50),
		DESC_TIPOARTICULO = substring(DESC_TIPOARTICULO,1,50),
		COD_ARTICULO = substring(COD_ARTICULO,1,50),
		DESC_ARTICULO = substring(DESC_ARTICULO,1,100),
		COD_GENERICO = substring(COD_GENERICO,1,50),
		DESC_GENERICO = substring(DESC_GENERICO,1,100),
		COD_MODELO = substring(COD_MODELO,1,50),
		COD_COLOR = substring(COD_COLOR,1,50),
		TALLA = substring(TALLA,1,50),
		LARGO = substring(LARGO,1,50),
		UNIDADES = substring(UNIDADES,1,50),
		COD_TEMPORADA = substring(COD_TEMPORADA,1,50),
		DESC_TEMPORADA = substring(DESC_TEMPORADA,1,50),
		COD_GRADOMODA = substring(COD_GRADOMODA,1,50),
		DESC_GRADOMODA = substring(DESC_GRADOMODA,1,50),
		INGRESOS = substring(INGRESOS,1,50),
		COSTOS = substring(COSTOS,1,50),
		DESC_CONSIGNACION = substring(DESC_CONSIGNACION,1,50),
		DESC_PROMOCION = substring(DESC_PROMOCION,1,50),
		DESC_CLOSEOUT = substring(DESC_CLOSEOUT,1,50),
		DESC_PRONTOPAGO = substring(DESC_PRONTOPAGO,1,50),
		DESC_PERSONAL = substring(DESC_PERSONAL,1,50),
		DESC_CLIENTE = substring(DESC_CLIENTE,1,50),
		MONEDA = substring(MONEDA,1,50),
		GTIN = substring(GTIN,1,50),
		COD_GRADOMODA_PERU = substring(COD_GRADOMODA_PERU,1,50),
		DESC_GRADOMODA_PERU = substring(DESC_GRADOMODA_PERU,1,50),
		ANO_ESTACION = substring(ANO_ESTACION,1,50),
		ID_VENDEDOR = substring(ID_VENDEDOR,1,50),
		CAP_WAM = substring(CAP_WAM,1,50),
		D_CAP_WAM = substring(D_CAP_WAM,1,50),
		CONS_GRP_2 = substring(CONS_GRP_2,1,50),
		D_CONS_GRP_2 = substring(D_CONS_GRP_2,1,50),
		CONS_TRG = substring(CONS_TRG,1,50),
		D_CONS_TRG = substring(D_CONS_TRG,1,50),
		FIT_REF = substring(FIT_REF,1,50),
		D_FIT_REF = substring(D_FIT_REF,1,50),
		GL_FIT_PLAT = substring(GL_FIT_PLAT,1,50),
		PROD_LINE = substring(PROD_LINE,1,50),
		D_PROD_LINE = substring(D_PROD_LINE,1,50),
		PROD_NAME = substring(PROD_NAME,1,50),
		PROG = substring(PROG,1,50),
		D_PROG = substring(D_PROG,1,50),
		SUB_CLASS = substring(SUB_CLASS,1,50),
		SUST = substring(SUST,1,50),
		D_SUST = substring(D_SUST,1,50),
		TECNO = substring(TECNO,1,50),
		D_TECNO = substring(D_TECNO,1,50),
		TIER = substring(TIER,1,50),
		D_TIER = substring(D_TIER,1,50),
		CLASS = substring(CLASS,1,50),
		D_CLASS = substring(D_CLASS,1,50)) ~> Columnaderivada1
VtaBoliviaDL select(mapColumn(
		SOCIEDAD_CO,
		COD_SOCIEDAD,
		DESC_SOCIEDAD,
		NRO_DOCUMENTO,
		POSICION,
		COD_CEBE,
		DESC_CEBE,
		PERIODO,
		FECHA_DOCUMENTO,
		COD_CLIENTE,
		NOMBRE_CLIENTE,
		COD_TIPOTIENDA,
		DESC_TIPOTIENDA,
		COD_TIENDA,
		DESC_TIENDA,
		COD_MARCA,
		DESC_MARCA,
		COD_ORG_VTA,
		DESC_ORG_VTA,
		COD_CANAL,
		DESC_CANAL,
		COD_CALIDAD,
		DESC_CALIDAD,
		COD_GENERO,
		DESC_GENERO,
		COD_LINEA,
		DESC_LINEA,
		COD_TIPO,
		DESC_TIPO,
		COD_PRENDA,
		DESC_PRENDA,
		COD_TIPOARTICULO,
		DESC_TIPOARTICULO,
		COD_ARTICULO,
		DESC_ARTICULO,
		COD_GENERICO,
		DESC_GENERICO,
		COD_MODELO,
		COD_COLOR,
		TALLA,
		LARGO,
		UNIDADES,
		COD_TEMPORADA,
		DESC_TEMPORADA,
		COD_GRADOMODA,
		DESC_GRADOMODA,
		INGRESOS,
		COSTOS,
		DESC_CONSIGNACION,
		DESC_PROMOCION,
		DESC_CLOSEOUT,
		DESC_PRONTOPAGO,
		DESC_PERSONAL,
		DESC_CLIENTE,
		MONEDA,
		GTIN,
		COD_GRADOMODA_PERU,
		DESC_GRADOMODA_PERU,
		ANO_ESTACION,
		ID_VENDEDOR,
		CAP_WAM = {CAPSULAS-WAM},
		D_CAP_WAM = {DESC. CAPSULAS-WAM},
		CONS_GRP_2 = {CONSUMER GROUP 2},
		D_CONS_GRP_2 = {DESC. CONSUMER GROUP 2},
		CONS_TRG = {CONSUMER TARGET},
		D_CONS_TRG = {DESC. CONSUMER_TARGET},
		FIT_REF = {FIT REFERENCE},
		D_FIT_REF = {DESC. FIT REFERENCE},
		GL_FIT_PLAT = {GLOBAL FIT PLATFORM},
		PROD_LINE = {PRODUCT LINE},
		D_PROD_LINE = {DESC. PRODUCT LINE},
		PROD_NAME = {PRODUCT NAME},
		PROG = PROGRAM,
		D_PROG = {DESC. PROGRAM},
		SUB_CLASS = SUBCLASS,
		SUST = SUSTENTABILIDAD,
		D_SUST = {DESC. SUSTENTABILIDAD},
		TECNO,
		D_TECNO = {DESC. TECNO},
		TIER,
		D_TIER = {DESC. TIER},
		CLASS,
		D_CLASS = {DESC. CLASS}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
Columnaderivada1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SOCIEDAD_CO as string,
		COD_SOCIEDAD as string,
		DESC_SOCIEDAD as string,
		NRO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		POSICION as string,
		COD_CEBE as string,
		DESC_CEBE as string,
		PERIODO as string,
		FECHA_DOCUMENTO as string,
		COD_CLIENTE as string,
		NOMBRE_CLIENTE as string,
		COD_TIPOTIENDA as string,
		DESC_TIPOTIENDA as string,
		COD_TIENDA as string,
		DESC_TIENDA as string,
		COD_MARCA as string,
		DESC_MARCA as string,
		COD_ORG_VTA as string,
		DESC_ORG_VTA as string,
		COD_CANAL as string,
		DESC_CANAL as string,
		COD_CALIDAD as string,
		DESC_CALIDAD as string,
		COD_GENERO as string,
		DESC_GENERO as string,
		COD_LINEA as string,
		DESC_LINEA as string,
		COD_TIPO as string,
		DESC_TIPO as string,
		COD_PRENDA as string,
		DESC_PRENDA as string,
		COD_TIPOARTICULO as string,
		DESC_TIPOARTICULO as string,
		COD_ARTICULO as string,
		DESC_ARTICULO as string,
		COD_GENERICO as string,
		DESC_GENERICO as string,
		COD_MODELO as string,
		COD_COLOR as string,
		TALLA as string,
		LARGO as string,
		UNIDADES as string,
		COD_TEMPORADA as string,
		DESC_TEMPORADA as string,
		COD_GRADOMODA as string,
		DESC_GRADOMODA as string,
		INGRESOS as string,
		COSTOS as string,
		DESC_CONSIGNACION as string,
		DESC_PROMOCION as string,
		DESC_CLOSEOUT as string,
		DESC_PRONTOPAGO as string,
		DESC_PERSONAL as string,
		DESC_CLIENTE as string,
		MONEDA as string,
		GTIN as string,
		COD_GRADOMODA_PERU as string,
		DESC_GRADOMODA_PERU as string,
		ANO_ESTACION as string,
		ID_VENDEDOR as string,
		CAP_WAM as string,
		D_CAP_WAM as string,
		CONS_GRP_2 as string,
		D_CONS_GRP_2 as string,
		CONS_TRG as string,
		D_CONS_TRG as string,
		FIT_REF as string,
		D_FIT_REF as string,
		GL_FIT_PLAT as string,
		PROD_LINE as string,
		D_PROD_LINE as string,
		PROD_NAME as string,
		PROG as string,
		D_PROG as string,
		SUB_CLASS as string,
		SUST as string,
		D_SUST as string,
		TECNO as string,
		D_TECNO as string,
		TIER as string,
		D_TIER as string,
		CLASS as string,
		D_CLASS as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 5)) ~> BDStaging
